DESCRIPTION: High school kid who knows the wonders of boxes.
Your friend is a teacher and fond of boxes, he can get his class to help you out... for a few of the boxes.
Woof woof... boof... bof.. box... boxes.. I want to make boxes...
Boxing using to run my life, now I run a life of boxes.
Cereal might be for kids... but the boxes are for everone.
These guys love poxes so much society punishes them for diving into them.
